ios-tutorials.text: The following applications give a step-by-step tutorial for iOS applications. Each respective application can be run by cd-ing to the base directory and invoking "ant run-Xcode".

application.name: HelloWorld (Fullscreen)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application running in fullscreen mode.

application.name: HelloWorld (Auto-Rotate)
application.text: HelloWorld application that rotates depending on device orientation.

application.name: HelloWorld (Landscape)
application.text: HelloWorld application that runs in landscape mode.

application.name: AutoResize
application.text: Use iOS' builtin mechanism for auto-resizing widgets when device orientation changes.

application.name: Relayout
application.text: Programmatically change the layout when device orientation changes.

android-tutorials.text: The following applications give a step-by-step tutorial for Android applications. Each respective application can be run by cd-ing to the base directory and invoking "ant run-Android".

application.name: HelloWorld (prog)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation without any layout resources.
